author: The Vegetarian Society
method: Squeeze grated ginger tightly in one hand over parsnips so all the juice runs out. Discard the remaining fibrous ginger. Mix all ingredients together and place in a shallow tin. Cook uncovered at 150C/300F/Gas 2 for 45 minutes. Turn occasionally.  Increase temperature to 200C/400F/Gas 6 and cook for a further 15-20 minutes until crisp and golden.
ingredients: 25g/1oz piece fresh root ginger, scrubbed and finely grated ,  450g/1lb parsnips, scrubbed and cut into ½in x 2in/1cm x 5cm batons ,  225g/8oz pickling onions, peeled (pour boiling water over them first to loosen skins) ,  1 tbsp soya oil ,  1 tbsp honey ,  2.5g/½ tsp turmeric
